categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Helarin was a Human female Jedi Master who served onboard the Republic's Carrick Station during the Cold War.

Helarin appeared as a gear vendor in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, but was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
